contentrichtext.text: {{for|the English soccer player|Sam Whittingham (footballer)}} <!-- Deleted image removed: [[Image:SamWhittingham.jpg|thumb|right|Sam Whittingham with his record-breaking Varna Diablo.]] --> '''Sam Whittingham''' is a [[Canada|Canadian]] [[cyclist]] who has held several world records on [[recumbent bicycle]]s. {{As of|2009}}, he holds the following world records under the sanction of the [[International Human Powered Vehicle Association]]: * The 200 m flying start (single rider, World Human Powered Speed Challenge, Battle Mountain, NV): 133.284 km/h (82.819 mph) on 2009-09-18. * First unpaced cyclist ever to break the deci-mach mark (1/10 the [[speed of sound]], World Human Powered Speed Challenge, Battle Mountain, NV): 132.50 km/h (82.33 mph) on 2008-09-18. To date, still the only person to have accomplished this milestone. * The 1000 m flying start (single rider): 128.40 km/h (79.79 mph) on 2001-10-06. * The 1 mile flying start (single rider): 126.55 km/h (78.64 mph) on 2001-10-06. * The [[hour record]]: 90.724 km (56.373 mi) on 2009-07-17.<ref>[http://www.ihpva.org/hpvarech.htm Official Speed Records. International Human Powered Vehicle Association]</ref> In 1993 he also held the record for the 200 m flying start (multiple rider). Sam Whittingham is founder, designer and builder for [http://www.timetogetnaked.com/ Naked Bicycles], a custom bicycle and accessory fabrication company based on [[Quadra Island]], [[British Columbia]], Canada. The company was originally named Forte bicycles before a name change in April 2006. Whittingham won the President's Award, the People's Choice Award and the Best of Show Award at the 2008 North American Handmade Bicycle Show in [[Portland, Oregon|Portland]], [[Oregon]] with an ornate fixed-gear bicycle that blended 1890s-style wooden rims and grips with modern hubs and a front disk brake. This bike was then sold to [[Lance Armstrong]]. Sam Whittingham is the grandson of screenwriter [[Jack Whittingham]], who wrote the first [[James Bond]] screenplay.<ref>[http://www.sylvanmason.com/thunderball/thunderball1.htm Thunderball]</ref> == See also == * [[Cycling records]] ==External links== * [http://www.timetogetnaked.com/ Naked Custom Bicycles, founded by Sam Whittingham] * [http://www.wisil.recumbents.com/wisil/fastest_list.asp Fastest Bicycles: Top Speed and One Hour] * [http://www.recumbents.com/wisil/whpsc2010/speedchallenge.htm World Human Powered Speed Challenge 2010 Battle Mountain Performances List â€“ updated frequently] * [http://varnahandcycles.com/ Varna Cycles, manufacturer of world record setting vehicle] ==References== <references/> {{Persondata | NAME = Whittingham, Sam | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Canadian recumbent cyclist | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Whittingham, Sam}} [[Category:Canadian cyclists]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] [[Category:Living people]] {{Canada-cycling-bio-stub}}
